Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.OpenSky

Class OpenSky

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.OpenSky.OpenSky
public class OpenSky
extends java.lang.Object
A class that interacts with the OpenSky API to retrieve information about aircraft and flights.

      Parameters:

      end - the end time in seconds since epoch
      Returns:
      JSONArray containing flight state vectors
